tool_description: Industrial-grade Sentiment Analysis API. Opinions from any language and about particular elements in the text.
name: Sentiment Analysis Industrial
title: Sentiment Analysis Industrial

api_list.name: Multilingual Aspect-based
api_list.description:
Sentiment about a particular element in the text.

## Multilingual Aspect-based Sentiment Analysis.

Aspect-based sentiment analysis is a text analysis technique that categorizes data by aspect and identifies the sentiment attributed to each one. Aspect-based sentiment analysis can be used to analyze customer feedback by associating specific sentiments with different aspects of a product or service.

When we talk about aspects, we mean the attributes or components of a product or service e.g. “the user experience of a new product,” “the response time for a query or complaint,” or “the ease of integration of new software.”

### Parameters

Here’s a breakdown the parameters of the API:

**Request Payload:**
Text: Document or text to be processed
Aspect: Category, entity, feature, or topic that you want to analyze in the text

**Response:**
Prediction: Sentiment positive or negative about a particular aspect
Confidence: Confidence-level of the prediction
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiment-analysis-industrial.p.rapidapi.com/v1/sentiment-analysis/multi_language_aspect_based"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiment-analysis-industrial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Multilingual
api_list.description:
Sentiment about a text in any language.

## Multilingual Sentiment Analysis.

Sentiment analysis is a natural language processing technique used to determine whether data is positive, negative or neutral. Sentiment analysis is often performed on textual data to help businesses monitor brand and product sentiment in customer feedback, and understand customer needs.

### What's Multilingual?
Are a type of Machine Learning model that can understand different languages, usually it is a single model that can handle multiple languages simultaneously. 

### Parameters
Here’s a breakdown the parameters of the API:

**Request Payload:**
Text: Document or text to be processed
Aspect: Category, entity, feature, or topic that you want to analyze in the text

**Response:**
Prediction: Sentiment positive or negative about a particular aspect
Confidence: Confidence-level of the prediction
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentiment-analysis-industrial.p.rapidapi.com/v1/sentiment-analysis/multi_language"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentiment-analysis-industrial.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
